oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Basics of dairy diet design: Feeds and how they are included in diets
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schcolnik, Enrique
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dairy
diet
design
feeds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The challenges of feeding dairy cows to maximize production while doing it in an economically sustainable way, requires dairy nutritionists and veterinarians to have a great understanding of rumen microbial output and the feeds we utilize to feed the rumen. It is the purpose of this presentation to describe and explain some very basic concepts of rumen dynamics and microbiology that are utilized to make decisions on how to include different feeds into diets while maintaining rumen and cow health and maximizing rumen output.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2021 Recent Graduate Proceedings ; 70-73
